BeatleWebWellcome.beatleWeb: Beatle Web is dedicated to every fan of THE BEATLES who has drawing, painting, sculpture or any other form of art as a hobby. On this page you will find my works related to THE BEATLES and THE HISTORY OF THE BEATLES IN COMICS, a comic divided into 8 chapters made by me in which it represents the history of the group from its beginnings.
BeatleWebWellcome.why: Because I am passionate about THE BEATLES and on this website I intend to reflect all my work and I wish you enjoy them as much as I have enjoyed doing them.
BeatleWebWellcome.what: What do I get out of all this?
BeatleWebWellcome.whatGet: I don't really get anything, just the satisfaction of doing something that I'm passionate about and the pleasure of being able to share it with THE BEATLES fans like me.
BeatleWebWellcome.when: How long has it taken you?
BeatleWebWellcome.whenDo: Este cómic llevo desarrollandolo durante años y actualmente sigo trabajando en él y en otros proyectos relacionados con THE BEATLES.
